summary: Three teenagers' quest to qualify for the 2012 US Olympic table tennis team.
cast: Ariel Hsing|Michael Landers|Lily Zhang|Xinhua Jiang|Michael Hsing|Joan Landers|Stan Landers|Linda Liu|Bob Zhang|Barney Reed|Erica Wu|Massimo Costantini|Jonathan Bricklin|Franck Raharinosy|Mark Croitoroo|Jun Gao|Ernesto Ebuen|Goran Milanovic|Mai|Brenda Young|Dennis Davis|Lyanne Kosaka|Sara Landers|Doru Gheorghe|Stefan Feth|Mike Cavanaugh|Tim Wang|Grant Li|Adam Hugh|Judy Hugh|Rachel Cui|Emily Semba|Danielle Petersen|Erik Ellefsen|Warren Buffett|Bill Gates|Chris Xu|Pierre-Luc Hinse|Pierre-Luc Theriault|Sean O'Neill|Han Xiao|Ryan Willard
director: Directors: Sara Newens, Mina T. Son
title: Top Spin
